<title level="1" pfs="">[Abendego Jailer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1687)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 27

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 22
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 10">[Abendego Jailer](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1687)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=90" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl](/Sources.aspx?ID=101) pg. 42</row>

**Perception** +19

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +20, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +21, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +18, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=17) +20

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +4

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3), [average manacles](/Equipment.aspx?ID=32), mancatcher, [religious symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41) of [Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13), _+1 [scale mail](/Armor.aspx?ID=8)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 30 

**Fort** +20 

**Ref** +21 

**Will** +17 

</row>

**HP** 175

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mancatcher +23 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+9 slashing plus restrain

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +23 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dagger +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195), [versatile S](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d4+9 piercing

**Restrain**   When the jailer makes a successful mancatcher Strike, their target must succeed at a DC 27 Reflex save or become [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) until the end of the jailer's next turn. Each time the target fails an attempt to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) the jailer, it takes 2d6 piercing damage.

**Subduing Attack**   Abendego jailers deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to creatures that are [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) or within reach of at least one of their allies. The jailer can make an attack with this additional damage as a [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) attack, if they choose.

</column>
name: Abendego Jailer

text: Abendego Jailer Recall Knowledge - Humanoid (Society): DC 27 Unspecific Lore : DC 25 Specific Lore : DC 22 Abendego Jailer Source Pathfinder #171: Hurricane's Howl pg. 42 Perception +19 Languages Common Skills Acrobatics +20, Athletics +21, Intimidation +18, Thievery +20 Str +5 Dex +4 Con +1 Int +0 Wis +3 Cha +2 Items Dagger, average manacles, mancatcher, religious symbol of Norgorber, +1 scale mail --- AC 30 Fort +20 Ref +21 Will +17 HP 175 Attack of Opportunity Reaction --- Speed 20 feet Melee Single Action mancatcher +23 (reach 10 feet), Damage 1d8+9 slashing plus restrain Melee Single Action dagger +23 (Agile, versatile S), Damage 1d4+9 piercing Ranged Single Action dagger +22 (Agile, thrown 10 feet, versatile S), Damage 1d4+9 piercing Restrain When the jailer makes a successful mancatcher Strike, their target must succeed at a DC 27 Reflex save or become grabbed until the end of the jailer's next turn. Each time the target fails an attempt to Escape the jailer, it takes 2d6 piercing damage. Subduing Attack Abendego jailers deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to creatures that are frightened or within reach of at least one of their allies. The jailer can make an attack with this additional damage as a nonlethal attack, if they choose.
